items.sentence: My parents always told me to be wary of strangers.
Tom didn't get what Mary asked him to get for her.
Tom checked to see if Mary's name was on the list.
How long has it been since we last saw each other?
Tom and Mary always finish each other's sentences.
If Tom isn't here by Monday, we'll go without him.
Tom's hyperactive imagination went into overdrive.
I just want to say that I'm glad that you're here.
The knives, forks and spoons go in the top drawer.
Tom should've offered to help Mary, but he didn't.
The coffee was so hot that I couldn't drink it up.
For Tom, this moment was the highlight of the day.
Why won't you treat Tom like a normal human being?
At first, it didn't seem like our plan would work.
I got a letter from a friend of mine in Australia.
Tom has a very bad reputation in certain quarters.
No one recognized Tom's genius while he was alive.
Do you have a complete set of Tom Jackson's works?
Tom was peering out of the window into the street.
In the dim light, Tom saw someone approaching him.
